titleStmt.title: The confession of Francis Nicholson (who committed that most barbarous murther upon the body of John Dimbleby, servant to Mr. Marriot) at the place of execution which was upon the green over against Hampton-Court, and near the place where he did the murther on Wednesday last, it being the 27th of October 1680 : who was afterwards carried to Hounslow-Heath and there hang'd up in chains.
titleStmt.author: Nicholson, Francis, d. 1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Richard Janeway,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
